price: Do not let Satan turn you away [from the straight path], for he is your sworn enemy.
arabic: وَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
